quest.name: A Wild Rose by Any Other Name
journal: Minfilia is waiting to hear whether or not you will pledge your support to the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.

Taken by an inexplicable urge to wax lyrical, you decide to signify your commitment to the cause by incorporating the order's password, “wild rose,” into a line of improvised verse. Betraying no embarrassment, Minfilia accepts your whimsical utterance in the spirit it was intended, and welcomes you to the Scions. She then introduces you to its leading members: the scholars of Sharlayan, some of whom are familiar to you. Without further ado, you are assigned your first task─to investigate a series of crimes committed in Ul'dah, which the Scions suspect to be primal-related. Speak with Thancred, the debonair bard, to learn the details of your mission.

Thancred believes that the caravan robbery and the recent spate of disappearances are connected. He suggests that you begin your investigation by visiting the scene of the suspected abductions. Make your way to Camp Drybone in eastern Thanalan, and seek the cooperation of a man named Isembard.
Arriving at Camp Drybone, you speak with Isembard, who offers you his full cooperation in the investigation.
objectives: Speak with Isembard at Camp Drybone.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: We Scions have but one objective: to safeguard the future of Eorzea. Among our gravest concerns are the godlike beings known as the primals. Long have we striven to find a lasting solution to the threat they pose.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I know not what it is you desire for yourself, nor what it was that first brought you to Eorzea, but I firmly believe that the power we possess was given to us for a purpose. Pray consider this when you give me your answer, Forename.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I will go whither the wild rose blooms.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yours is no small endeavor...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The dangers are great...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Small? No. Worthy? Undeniably. We labor for the good of all the realm.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: They are. Yet the risks we take are justified, given that which is at stake.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I take it you will help us.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Wonderful! I knew you wouldn't let us down!

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Forgive me for treating you as a stranger. I know you deserve better than this, considering all you've done for the realm.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: It remains unclear why no one remembers you. We can only assume that it is a consequence of the power that Louisoix invoked to save your life.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: But irrespective of the cause, know that whatever shroud has fallen upon people's memories, there will surely be a way to lift it.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Thank you for understanding.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: But come, I would introduce you to your friends in the order.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Tell me, does the name Sharlayan ring any bells?

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: It used to be one of Eorzea's six city–states, and was situated in the northwest of Aldenard.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The Sharlayans were the keepers of wisdom both old and new. Their mastery over magic and aether was unsurpassed, and even the Garleans knew to fear them.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Among their number, there were a noble few who devoted their lives to safeguarding the future of Eorzea.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: When the realm began its descent into chaos, and their countrymen fled for the motherland, they alone chose to remain here. These noble men and women were called the Archons.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Those same brave souls stand before you now.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: The masked woman is Yda, and beside her is Papalymo. The two are charged with surveying the Twelveswood.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Hello there!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Well come!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: I had every confidence that you would agree to help us.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Me too!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Okay, my turn to introduce someone! That there is Thancred!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: He is our man here in Ul'dah, jewel of the desert.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Welcome to the team!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I never doubted that you'd come!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: If I may, the lovely maiden beside me is named Y'shtola. Limsa Lominsa has the pleasure of being under her care.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Greetings.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I have been expecting you.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Last but not least is Urianger, who presides over all affairs within these halls. Pray seek him out whenever you have questions.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Dawn may banish even the darkest night...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: ...The words of a dear friend. I am glad of our meeting.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: At the Battle of Carteneau, our leader was taken from us. But we did not stray from our purpose.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: We sought out Minfilia and others with her talent, and together established the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Along with the Archons, those blessed with the Echo play a pivotal role in our endeavor to forge a brighter tomorrow for the realm.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Oh, I should also introduce you to Tataru, our clerk. She ensures that everything runs smoothly.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Pleased to make your acquaintance!

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: In time, I hope you will come to think of us as family.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: But without further ado...

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: I would assign you your first task.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Urianger. Have the documents arrived from the Students of Baldesion?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Aye, my lady, they arrived but recently.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: We have received a request for aid from the Immortal Flames.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Thancred, would you do the honors?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: It would be my pleasure.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Some days ago, a crystal caravan registered to Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern was waylaid and divested of its cargo.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: But there is more. Within a bell of the robbery, several people were reported missing from the shantytown outside the city.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: At a glance, one would assume the involvement of bandits, kidnappers, and coincidence.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: Such crimes are hardly uncommon, and the Immortal Flames deal with their like almost every day.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: However, this time we have reason to believe that a primal is involved.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Aye, the evidence left behind implicates the Amalj'aa, who are known worshipers of Ifrit.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: If we then consider the objects that were taken, there is no room left for doubt─the crimes were committed in the name of a primal.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: That you may better understand the nature of our struggle with the primals, I would have you play the leading role in this investigation.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: You have my thanks.

dialogue.name: MINFILIA
dialogue.text: If there is aught you wish to know, I recommend you speak with Thancred. He is well versed in the affairs of Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Ever at your service, fair ladydear fellow!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Ready to begin, are we? That's the spirit!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: So then, your mission is to investigate a crystal robbery and a spate of abductions.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...Crimes which we believe to be connected. Assuming we are correct, it is like that any discoveries we make in relation to one will further our understanding of the other.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Now, since the attack on their caravan, our friends at Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern have doubled security over all their shipments.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: In light of this, it is my judgment that the abductions should be our priority.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: According to our preliminary findings, the majority of the missing were last seen in the vicinity of Camp Drybone, so that would seem a fine place to begin.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: A fellow by the name of Isembard serves as the camp's de facto leader. Pay him a visit, and see that he gives us his full cooperation.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Aye, I'm Isembard. Here to search for the missing folk, I take it?

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Minfilia sent word that an adventurer fitting your description would be along.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: She also warned us to be wary of the Amalj'aa. It seems we know who the culprits are, at the very least.

dialogue.name: ISEMBARD
dialogue.text: Now, I bear no official title at this camp, but the people here have come to look to me for leadership. You have my word that I'll do all I can to help see the victims safely returned.

obj.n: The Scions of the Seventh Dawn
